stanza.line: The other two slight air and purging firefire
Are both with thee wherever I abideabide
The first my thought the other my desiredesire
These present-absent with swift motion slideslide
For when these quicker elements are gonegone
In tender embassy of love to theethee
My life being made of four with two alonealone
Sinks down to death oppressed with melancholymelancholy
By those swift messengers returned from theethee
Who even but now come back again assuredassured
Of thy fair health recounting it to meme
This told I joy but then no longer gladglad
I send them back again and straight grow sadsad
